tossup_question: -   –  Heat, Q, is added to a monatomic ideal gas under conditions of constant volume, resulting in a temperature change, delta T. How much heat will be required to produce the same temperature change, if it is added under conditions of constant pressure?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) 3/5 Q
X) Q
Y) 5/3 Q
Z) 2 Q
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following is the molecular orbital theory prediction for the bond order of the dioxygenyl radical cation, whose chemical formula is O2+?
